protein.specific_function: Has heparin binding activity, and growth promoting activity. Involved in neointima formation after arterial injury, possibly by mediating leukocyte recruitment. Also involved in early fetal adrenal gland development

reference.reference_text: Tsutsui J, Uehara K, Kadomatsu K, Matsubara S, Muramatsu T: A new family of heparin-binding factors: strong conservation of midkine (MK) sequences between the human and the mouse. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1991 Apr 30;176(2):792-7.
